page.title: 01FARMING
page.content: WE START WITH FARMING AS THIS IS RURAL AREA. THE MAIN CROP IN THIS BLOCK IS CEREALS THE FARMERS CAN GROW TWO CROPS OF CEREAL ON THE SAME PEICE OF LAND IN THE SAME YEAR.THE OTHER CROPS THEY GROW ARE SUGER BEET,CABBAGE,BRUSSEL SPROUTS,ONIONS,PEAS, POTATOES, AND CAULIFLOWERS. THE FARMING IS INTENCE BECAUSE THE SOIL IN THIS AREA IS VERY FERTILE ITS FORM IS SILT LOAM.MOST OF THE SMALL FARM HOLDINGS HAVE GONE NOW,ALL THESE FARMS HAVE BEEN BROUGHT OUT AND ARE OWNED BY BIG GROUPS.THERE IS NO DAIRY FARMING IN THIS AREA NOW BUT OCCASIONALLY SHEEP ARE BROUGHT INTO THE AREA TO FEED FROM FIELDS WHICH HAS HAD BRUSSELS PICKED FROM THEM AND ONLY THE STORKS REMAIN. THE SHEEP ARE KEPT IN BY AN ELECTRIFIED FENCE RUN BY A SMALL BATTERY. THE FENCE IS PORTABLE AND IS EASY TO MOVE AND ERECT.
